posts.post_content:
Can never figure out how to upload pics here but shoot me a PM with email address and I will send over. 

Piedmont 350/25 Cobb Bat On PSA 2.5  $5300

Located in MD, willing to do a face to face trade up/down for other low grade Cobb stuff…

Would love to see the Cobb and I can’t figure out how to do pics on here either. Jim 

[url]Jimmynonkes@yahoo.com[/url]

Hey Guys
Generally pictures taken from a cell phone don't work real well on here. They need to be downsized quite a bit. Anything over about 1mb won't load....you can host the pic elsewhere and use the little yellow box right above here with a mountain in it, to post here. You just click on that and put the link in there...
If on a pc you just take the pics from your pictures file and upload them here...same size requirement

Generally pictures taken from a cell phone don't work real well on here. They need to be downsized quite a bit. Anything over about 1mb won't load....you can host the pic elsewhere and use the little yellow box right above here with a mountain in it, to post here. You just click on that and put the link in there...
If on a pc you just take the pics from your pictures file and upload them here...same size requirement[/QUOTE]I take all my pictures on my cell phone. Rarely have a problem. 

Sent from my SAMSUNG-SM-G930A using Tapatalk
